name: IsraelRadioSkill
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: israel radio
des: This skill will allow you to listen to your favorite Israeli radio station (currently supports Galgalatz and Kan88). To open the skill, say "Alexa, open Israel radio". Then, say "play Galgalatz" to start listen to a live Galgalatz radio station stream
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
